00034 Entree& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::readOn(Entree& is)
00035 {
00036   assert(l_inco_ch.non_nul() && le_fluide.non_nul());
00037   return Convection_Diffusion_std::readOn(is);
00038 }

00050 void Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::associer_milieu_base(const Milieu_base& un_milieu)
00051 {
00052   const Fluide_Dilatable_base& un_fluide = ref_cast(Fluide_Dilatable_base,un_milieu);
00053   associer_fluide(un_fluide);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::associer_fluide(const Fluide_Dilatable_base& un_fluide)
00057 {
00058   le_fluide = un_fluide;
00059 }
00060 
00061 int Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::impr(Sortie& os) const
00062 {
00063   return Equation_base::impr(os);
00064 }
00065 
00066 const Champ_Don& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::diffusivite_pour_transport()
00067 {
00068   return is_thermal() ? milieu().conductivite() /* lambda */ : le_fluide->mu_sur_Schmidt() /* rho * D */;
00069 }
00070 
00071 const Fluide_Dilatable_base& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::fluide() const
00072 {
00073   if (!le_fluide.non_nul())
00074     {
00075       Cerr << "You forgot to associate the fluid to the problem named " << probleme().le_nom() << finl;
00076       Process::exit();
00077     }
00078   return le_fluide.valeur();
00079 }
00080 
00081 Fluide_Dilatable_base& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::fluide()
00082 {
00083   assert(le_fluide.non_nul());
00084   return le_fluide.valeur();
00085 }
00086 
00087 const Milieu_base& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::milieu() const
00088 {
00089   return fluide();
00090 }
00091 
00092 Milieu_base& Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_base::milieu()
00093 {
00094   return fluide();
00095 }
